data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Jinchang, Gansu, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jinchang, Gansu, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Jinchang, Gansu, China to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Jinchang, Gansu, China.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, please raise up prophets in Jinchang who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Jinchang a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Yugur, Enger people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Yugur, Enger people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Yugur, Enger people is yours.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 144,400 people living in the county of Jinchang.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Jinchang, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jinchang, Gansu, China has a population of 144,400.

We estimate Jinchang has 10,954 people who might know Jesus, 2,333 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 131,113 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Jinchang, Gansu, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."
